travelers.description: Tell and new travelers their alignment by showing the YOU ARE token and a thumbs up or down. If they are evil: Show the THIS IS THE DEMON token. Point to the Demon. Any night actions by travelers should be done now.

minion_info.description: If there are 7 or more players, wake all Minions: Show the THIS IS THE DEMON token. Point to the Demon. Show the THESE ARE YOUR MINIONS token. Point to the other Minions.

demon_info.description: If there are 7 or more players, wake the Demon: Show the THESE ARE YOUR MINIONS token. Point to all Minions. Show the THESE CHARACTERS ARE NOT IN PLAY token Show 3 not-in-play good characters.

dawn.description: Wait for a few seconds. End the Night Phase.
